remarks: A relationship between the rank function and the cumulative hierarchy of sets function ` R1 ` .  Proposition 9.15(2) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79. (Contributed by NM, 6-Oct-2003.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
statement: rankr1g $p |- ( A e. V -> ( B = ( rank ` A ) <-> ( -. A e. ( R1 ` B ) /\ A e. ( R1 ` suc B ) ) ) ) $.
